Colonel Heather Fox, USAF, joined the NWC as military faculty in July 2022. She was previously the Commander of the 9th Reconnaissance Wing at Beale AFB, CA.
Heather Fox. Actress: House. Heather Fox is known for House (2004), Angie Tribeca (2016) and Justified (2010).
